unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during that Ranji Trophy match on 20/10/2023. Hope it's nothing serious before the Asia Cup final on 17/09/2023. They really need him for the clash against Pakistan! Any word on Bumrah's recovery from that back thing? Last I heard, he was training at the NCA, Bangalore. 16:00 hrs update, please! Fingers crossed both are fit. Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey! Any news on J A D E J A? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during that Ranji Trophy match on twentieth October two thousand and twenty three. Hope it's nothing serious before the Asia Cup final on seventeenth September two thousand and twenty three. They really need him for the clash against Pakistan! Any word on B U M R A H's recovery from that back thing? Last I heard, he was training at the N C A, Bangalore. sixteen hundred hours update, please! Fingers crossed both are fit. Jai Hind!
